center.name: --m-container-align-center
center.comment: Aligns container to center of parent

start.name: --m-container-align-start
start.comment: Aligns container to start/leading/left of container

end.name: --m-container-align-end
end.comment: Aligns container to end/trailing/right of container

default.name: --m-container-inset-default
default.comment: Default container inline padding. Alias of space-m. 16px

none.name: --m-container-max-none
none.comment: Allows the container to span the full width of it's parent.
